name: CasinoRush by PokerStars
description:
Play new, innovative fast games as poker meets casino at Casino Rush - the latest FREE poker and casino app from PokerStars, the world's largest online poker brand.

******Poker and Casino reinvented******
Want something new and exciting? Tired of the same-ol’-same-ol’ free poker games? Come feel the thrill of supercharged poker casino action as we fuse the slots-experience with traditional card games at Casino Rush. Experience unique poker games that are as exciting as Texas Hold’em Poker, Omaha Poker or 7-card stud. This is casino poker like you've never seen it before, designed by true Poker Professionals to give you the deluxe Las Vegas casino style experience you deserve.

***Play the fastest poker game on the planet!***
If you like poker but want a fast experience you can play anywhere, anytime, even when you are not online, CasinoRush if for you. You will love our new free casino poker games, including Swap the Flop Poker, Hold’em Switch, All In Split, and Lucky Hands. These games are built especially for mobile - so there’s no waiting around for others to play, just rapid action with huge poker payouts and casino jackpots.

Play the game wherever and whenever you want with OFFLINE mode. There’s no need for an internet connection, just start playing.

***Free chips every day!***
Get free chips every day in our two bonus games, daily slot spins and flips of Where’s The Lady. Earn rewards as you level up. Play our amazing collectible challenges to unlock mystery rewards, free poker chips and crazy free game modes!

***Climb the Leader board***
Challenge the best poker players in your country and around the world. Take part in private leader boards with your friends, and challenge them to discover who is the true master.

***Play our exciting innovative games***
***Hold'em Switch***
The fastest poker casino game you'll ever play - Get the chance to switch your poker hand and beat the dealer!
***Swap the Flop***
A quick-fire game against the house where the rules are easy - Just play the flop you are dealt or swap it for a new one!
***Double Ditch Hold'em***
Start with four cards and keep discarding cards until you make your best hand, another rapid poker casino game!
***All-in Poker Split***
The thrill of poker meets the skill of blackjack - Play one hand against the dealer or double your bet and play two!

***Enjoy New content***
We’ll be updating our games regularly, so keep an eye out for new content, new free games and new features every two weeks.

Make your way to Casino Rush, win millions of chips and unlock new innovative poker and casino games along the way!

***Coming soon***
Look for our amazing online poker tournaments where you can challenge your friends and foes to a heads-up shootout, or win millions of casino chips in thousands of tournaments running around the clock!

This is the new poker and casino slots game that EVERYONE is talking about. Come and play today!

This product is intended for use by those aged 21 or older for amusement purposes only.
Practice or success at social casino gaming does not imply future success at real money gambling.
